page.title: 10THE CUMNOCK CHRONICLE (1)
page.content:
The Cumnock Chronicle is Cumnock's local paper. It provides all each week's news. On Aug. 22 1985 the week's local news was about the future of the Killoch pit. The headlines read:-
"M.P's REVIEW - FEARS FOR PIT.
The National Coal Board have invoked their review procedure at Killoch Colliery...sparking off another round of denials and doubts over the pit's future.Local people fear the pit may close and as it is the main employer in the area this is the most important local concern."
